lines.text: This jacket is made of genuine India rubber. It distracts the rain completely. Wearing one of these is like having a roof over your head.
That's fine for folks too stupid to get out of the rain.
If your brains would stink, it wouldn't even smell.

[to Sarah]
Yes ma'am, we're going to wrap a necklace of good Kentucky hemp around that little neck of yours. Have you ever heard the sound a broke neck bone makes? It sounds like a carrot.
So what do you need money so bad for? I thought you said you were a farmer!
Well, I am... or I'm going to be.
In the meantime, you just rob people, right?
Sometimes you got to do some wrong to do some good.
Why is it that every time you bed down with a woman she thinks she's entitled to opinions and your affairs?
